bug.author: Yancey1989
bug.summary: Workflow step failed if the SQL program contains blank line

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Yancey1989>@Yancey1989</denchmark-link> , could you please double check the example SQL you provided? I wasn't able to reproduce it in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sql-machine-learning/sqlflow/compare/develop...tonyyang-svail:fix_1727?expand=1>the experiment</denchmark-link> .
